AdditionalFields.Value: Clinical Research Excluding Trials,Experimental and Molecular Therapeutics,Survivorship,Tumor Microenvironment

Description: This exciting session will overview novel preclinical models in which both understanding and targeting of the ovarian cancer microenvironment may be explored to provide more accurate assessments of how and what targets should move from animal models to the clinic (F. Balkwill). Novel preclinical work targeting the ovarian microenvironment will be discussed and pathways forward imagined (K. Fuh). Finally - early clinical data from trials exploring engineered cellular therapies and bispecific antibodies in ovarian cancer will be presented and placed in context of the greater ovarian cancer landscape (K. Moore).
SearchResultBody: AOS07. The Ovarian Cancer Microenvironment: Promise for New Therapies
Title: The Ovarian Cancer Microenvironment: Promise for New Therapies
